part.title: Document purpose
part.para: This document describes how users can use PDFedit program. Describes how install and run program and how work with him in command line mode or in gui. Describes using and writing users scripts too.

sect1.title: Document organization
sect1.para:
Document itself is divided into several parts:
which focuces on global view of application.
which focuses on instalation of PDFEdit. Describes what is need and how configured instalation for concrete user.
which describes command parameters of programs.
which describes graphical user interface. How use and simple manipulate with pdf documents.
which describes script language useing in PDFEdit and usable function and classes to edit pdf documents.
